definition: A type of alcoholic beverage made from fermented grapes, typically red in color. It is commonly enjoyed during meals, social gatherings, and special occasions.

examples.english: I like to drink red wine.
This red wine tastes very good.
Red wine goes well with meat dishes.

examples.german: Ich habe gestern eine Flasche Rotwein gekauft.
examples.english: I bought a bottle of red wine yesterday.

examples.german: Rotwein wird oft bei festlichen Anl√§ssen serviert.
examples.english: Red wine is often served at festive occasions.
